mapper.insert:
SELECT alcohol_type_board_seq.nextVal FROM dual
INSERT INTO alcohol_type_board (type_no, type_title, type_content, type_writeDate, type_originalFileName, type_newFileName,type_category, ssn) VALUES (#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{category}, #{memberDTO.ssn} )
mapper.select: SELECT type_no, type_title, type_content, type_hits, type_writeDate, type_newFileName, type_category, m.nickname FROM alcohol_type_board f, member m WHERE type_title LIKE ('%'||#{value}||'%') AND m.ssn = f.ssn
SELECT type_no, type_title, type_content, type_hits, type_writeDate, type_newFileName, type_category, m.nickname FROM alcohol_type_board f, member m WHERE m.nickname = #{value} AND m.ssn = f.ssn
SELECT type_no,type_title,type_content,type_hits,type_writeDate,type_newFileName,type_category,type_like,type_hate, m.nickname FROM alcohol_type_board f, member m WHERE f.ssn=m.ssn
SELECT type_no,type_title,type_content,type_hits,type_writeDate,type_newFileName,type_category,type_like,type_hate, m.nickname FROM alcohol_type_board f, member m WHERE f.ssn=m.ssn AND type_no=#{no}

SELECT type_no,type_title,type_content,type_hits,type_writeDate,type_newFileName ,type_category,type_like,type_hate, ssn FROM (SELECT type_no,type_title,type_content,type_hits,type_writeDate,type_newFileName ,type_category,type_like,type_hate,f.ssn FROM alcohol_type_board f, member m WHERE f.ssn = m.ssn ORDER BY type_like DESC) WHERE rownum <= 5
mapper.update: update alcohol_type_board set type_hits=type_hits+1 where type_no=#{no}
